name: Startup Canvas
description:
Use this when you are not being asked to improve upon an existing product but to invent an entirely new product. 


Try filling it in the following order:

  1. Customer Segment
  2. Problem
  3. Value Proposition
  4. Solution
  5. Market
  6. Channel
  7. Revenue Model
  8. External Risks
  9. Key Performance Indicators
  10. Team
